page.title: 18Peterlee Tertiary College.
page.content: {Peterlee}now has its own newly formed {Tertiary College,}running a wide range of academic and vocational courses, as well as a centre for local unemployed people.The centre aims both to educate and entertain the unemployed, and attempts to develop such skills as family budgetting and interviewing techniques. Peterlee was an obvious place for the setting up of such a college. The local{population}totals 23,000 with its{catchment area bringing in another 528,000. This, coupled with the fact that it is an area of{high unemployment,}means that all resources found at the college are put to maximum use. The setting up of the Tertiary College has been met with a very mixed reception. Although many people are in favour and the courses are quite well attended, many people think it is a{"white elephant".
